title: Student visas and F-1/J-1 status documents
dataVerified: Full name, DOB, nationality, school/program, SEVIS number, study authorization period
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake student visas. Domain binding verifies SEVIS/DHS. School enrollment verification. Work authorization (CPT/OPT). Prevents student visa fraud. F-1/J-1 compliance verification. For privacy, issuers can add a random salt line to raise entropy and defeat guessing attacks.
